query:
UPDATE finalization_data
        SET finalization_tx = $1
        FROM (
            SELECT
            UNNEST ($2::bytea[]) as tx_hash,
            UNNEST ($3::integer[]) as event_index_in_tx
        ) AS u
        WHERE
            finalization_data.tx_hash = u.tx_hash
            AND
            finalization_data.event_index_in_tx = u.event_index_in_tx
